response.overview: Hang dreams of suffering from sleep paralysis. Strange events then ensue, including: a new coworker acting oddly, a man behaving bizarrely in the men's restroom, and a photocopy machine spitting out envelopes. In the end, he even saw a bald man he met in his sleep. After work, he boards a reckless minibus speeding down the road, and he finally understands the true meaning behind all these bizarre incidents.
response.title: Sisyphus Dreaming
